name: Warmog's Armor
simpleDescription: Grants massive Health and Health Regen

passives.effects: Grants ''Warmog's Heart'' if you have at least {{as|2000 '''bonus''' health}}.

passives.name: Warmog's Heart
passives.effects: {{stil|Health regeneration|Regenerate}}{{ft|{{as|{{fd|1.5}}% '''maximum''' health}} every {{fd|0.5}} seconds|{{as|15% '''maximum''' health}} every 5 seconds}}if [[damage]] has not been taken in the last 8 seconds (3 seconds for damage from non-champions).

passives.name: Warmog's Vitality
passives.effects: Gain {{as|'''bonus''' health}} equal to {{as|12% '''bonus''' health '''from items'''}}.
